title: Leaver buster
body: When my friends and i were waiting for a leaver buster the lobby we were in disbanded the leaver buster queue while we still had 6 minutes or so left and we had to restart the 20 minute leaver buster over again. I personally see why it happened because we were in there for more than an hour but it shouldn't have ended. And please do not just say shouldn't get leaver busters the person couldnt help it her laptop over heated and shut off. please make it so that it cant happen. if you have any questions feel free to email me or respond to this post.

replies.body:
This is how room queues work. If someone leaves the room, it restarts the queue, which then restarts the low-priority queue. I recommend ensuring everyone in the room has time to wait out the queue and play the match in its entirety. 

If you'd like to leave detailed feedback on the Leaverbuster system, I encourage you to leave it on the [Miscellaneous boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous). As for your friend's overheating issue, I recommend they check out [our youtube video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EFrZbViFqf8) that addresses common solutions. Let me know if you have any questions.

The leave buster definitely needs to be addressed because there are a variety of things that affect why a person DC's, not just to dodge a game. I am sorry this happened and I hope there is a resolution soon :(
